keywords: ['pop', 'jingle', 'no singer', 'instrumental', 'electric guitar', 'synth bass', 'electronic drums', 'ping sound effect', 'generic', 'common', 'groovy', 'medium tempo']
caption: This is a pop-sounding jingle at the background of an instructive video. There is an electric guitar playing the main theme while the bass line is being played by a synth bass. In the rhythmic background, a very basic 4/4 beat is being played on the electronic drums. A ping sound effect signifies the end of the instruction in the video. The atmosphere is very generic and common-sounding. This piece could be used as a jingle in advertisements and tutorial videos.
